SEARCH

Class menuItemGUI

java.lang.Object
menuItemGUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionListener, EventListener
public class menuItemGUI extends Object implements ActionListener
Implement the Menu Item Graphical User Interface. Only accessed by managers, this page will allow managers to add, update and deactive items sold on the menu.

      name - menu item name
      cost - the cost of the new menu item
      Throws:
      SQLException - error check if query is unsuccessful

      menu_item - menu item name
      index - the location of the menu item information in list
      Throws:
